Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Found you! It's fun to play hide-and-seek with you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It would've taken me a lot longer to find you if you didn't have so many saws.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hehe, you can also praise Nanami for coming up with the great idea to open up the road with saws.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Okay, next is your turn to look for me!', 4: '1'}
